forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow this morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening tapering to showers and becoming mixed with snow overnight. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow this evening. Snow showers overnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with snow showers around in the evening. Low 29F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. Low -8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a chance of lingering snow showers later. Low 19F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High -3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low 22F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Intermittent snow showers, especially early. High near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 18F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near -5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High around 25F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around -10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 16F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy. Light snow likely in the afternoon. High -4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming cloudy. Snow likely in the afternoon. High 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light snow in the evening will yield to a mostly cloudy sky overnight. Low -6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Light snow in the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 23F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with periods of freezing rain later in the day. High -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with freezing rain becoming likely during the afternoon. High 33F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening giving way to freezing rain overnight. Low -4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow and ice accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 28F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will mix with rain at times during the afternoon. High near 0C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low near 30F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.
